member.name: M:QuizyfyAPI.Controllers.ChoicesController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get list of all choices for given quiz id and question id.
member.param: Parameter which tells us to which quiz question belongs to.
Id of question we want to get choices from.
member.returns: An ActionResult of ChoiceModel array type
member.remarks:
Sample request (this request returns **array of choices**)
GET /quizzes/1/questions/1/choices
member.response: Returns array of all choices
No questions exists so return nothing.
Quiz or question doesn't exist.

member.name: M:QuizyfyAPI.Controllers.ChoicesController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get one choice for given quiz and question id.
member.param: Parameter which tells us to which quiz question belongs to.
Id of question we want to get choice from.
Id of choice we want to return.
member.remarks:
Sample request (this request returns **one choice**)
GET /quizzes/1/questions/1/choices/1
member.response: Returns one choice
No questions exists so return nothing.
Choice doesn't exist.

Id of question you want to update.

Id of choice you want to delete.

Sample request (this request returns **response code only**)
